title: Payment Failure Blocking Modal
message: QA verified - Payment blocker modal working correctly. PM please confirm UI and UX.
test_setup: Organization subscription_status set to 'past_due'. PaymentBlocker modal appears immediately on all dashboard routes.
acceptance_criteria: Full-screen modal appears when org status is 'past_due'
Agents see read-only message directing them to contact admin
Modal cannot be dismissed without resolving payment
